item.title: Report E-2024110049
item.description:
Report E-2024110049

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-07T12:22:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-03
  • City: BRIDGEPORT
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 2100 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XBP. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of BYK-A 501 SG was released from a 55-gallon metal drum due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted the concrete at dock door 35. ERTS reviewed with the caller that they need to call DERTS before starting any cleanup activities on-site. Called Chemtrec and spoke to Mona. Report #2024100300255. Connecticut Dept. of Environmental Protection: 860-424-3338 spoke to Mark 223 Report #202402914. Metal drum containerized into a 65-gallon metal drum along with oil dri.

item.title: Report X-2024110019
item.description:
Report X-2024110019

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-04T12:23:29+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-01
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN UNDECLARE PACKAGE WAS FOUND WET DUE TO INTERNAL LEAKAGE AND HAD NO DOT LABELS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. 1X1 FLUID GALLON REGULATED METAL CAN OF RUSTOLEUM HEAT RESISTANT COATING METAL SOLVENT ALUMINUM COVER SEAL FAILED AND THE COVER BECAME LOOSE AND THE CONTENTS LEAKED OUT STAINING THE WHOLE CAN AN INVOICE WAS INCLUDED THAT STATED ITEM #36ND74 RUSTOLEUM HEAT RESISTANT COATING METAL SOLVENT ALUMINUM WAS ENCLOSED. THE PACKAGE CONTAINS REGULATED ITEMS INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE MAKING THE PACKAGE UNDECLARED.
